resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2979</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chiune (Sempo) Sugihara - Righteous Among the Nations.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chiune (Sempo) Sugihara - Righteous unter den 
Nationen.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chiune (Sempo) Sugihara - Juste parmi les 
nations.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chiune (Sempo) Sugihara - Righteous entre as 
nações.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chiune (Sempo) Sugihara - Righteous fra le 
nazioni.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Chiune (Sempo) Sugihara - δίκαιο μεταξύ των 
εθνών.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Chiune (Sempo) Sugihara - Righteous entre las 
naciones.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a lesson plan for students to learn about the unique self-sacrifice and actions of Righteous among the Nations, through the story of Chiune Sugihara, a diplomat from Japan, who helped Jews escape during the Holocaust.Lessonplan is available to download and print.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Holocaust survivors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">world war II</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jewish life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nazi germany</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">humanitarian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moral dilemma</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Lektionplan, damit Kursteilnehmer über den
eindeutigen Self-sacrifice erlernen und Tätigkeiten von Righteous 
unter den Nationen, durch die Geschichte von Chiune Sugihara, ein 
Diplomat von Japan, das Juden half, während des Holocaust.Lessonplan 
zu entgehen, ist vorhanden zu downloaden und zu drucken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un plan de leçon pour que les étudiants se 
renseignent sur le seul art de l'auto-portrait-sacrifice et les actions de 
Juste parmi les nations, par l'histoire de Chiune Sugihara, un 
diplomate du Japon, qui a aidé des juifs à s'échapper pendant le 
Holocaust.Lessonplan est disponible pour télécharger et imprimer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma planta da lição para que os estudantes 
aprendam sobre o self-sacrifice original e as ações de Righteous 
entre as nações, com a história de Chiune Sugihara, um diplomata de
Japão, que ajudou a jews se escapar durante o Holocaust.Lessonplan 
estão disponíveis download e imprimir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un programma di lezione affinchè gli allievi 
impari circa il self-sacrifice unico e le azioni di Righteous fra le 
nazioni, con la storia di Chiune Sugihara, un diplomatico dal 
Giappone, che ha aiutato gli ebrei a fuoriuscire durante il 
Holocaust.Lessonplan è a disposizione trasferire e stampare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για τους σπουδαστές 
για να μάθει για τη μοναδική μόνος-θυσία και οι ενέργειες 
δίκαιου μεταξύ των εθνών, μέσω της ιστορίας Chiune 
Sugihara, ενός διπλωμάτη από την Ιαπωνία, που βοήθησε τη 
διαφυγή Εβραίων κατά τη διάρκεια του ολοκαυτώματος Lessonplan 
είναι διαθέσιμες για να μεταφορτώσουν και να τυπώσουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un plan de la lección para que los estudiantes 
aprendan sobre el self-sacrifice único y las acciones de Righteous 
entre las naciones, con la historia de Chiune Sugihara, un diplomata 
de Japón, que ayudó a judíos a escaparse durante el 
Holocaust.Lessonplan está disponibles descargar y para imprimir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Holocaust Überlebende</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
